variable.name: ANALYTE_TYPE
variable.description: Analyte Type [DNA Somatic, DNA Genomic, DNA WGA Cleaned, Total RNA]

variable.name: Tissue Site
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected

variable.name: Sample Zonal Origin
variable.description: Anatomical zone of the prostate from which sample derived [Peripheral Zone (PZ), Transitional Zone (TZ), Central Zone (CZ), Central Zone (CZ)/Peripheral Zone (PZ), Peripheral Zone (PZ)/Central Zone (Cz)]

variable.name: Histologic Grade
variable.description: Indicates level of cell differentiation of participant tumor [Normal, Low grade/Well-differentiated, Intermediate grade/Moderately-differentiated, High grade/Poorly-differentiated, Anaplastic]

variable.name: RIN Number
variable.description: RNA integrity number of RNA sample [N/A]

variable.name: Gleason Score
variable.description: Composite score of histological grades of participant tumor reflecting severity of disease

variable.name: TMPRSS2-ERG Fusion Status
variable.description: TMPRSS2-ERG gene fusion status of participant tumor [Negative, Positive, Fusion with interstitial deletion]

variable.name: % Pattern Field
variable.description: Percent of participant tumor specimen with grade 4 or 5 histology
